text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to create glossy eyelids?
text.Response A:
To create glossy eyelids, you will need the following supplies:

- Eye shadow
- Eye liner
- Mascara
- Lip gloss

To create the glossy eyelids, start by applying a layer of eye shadow to your eyelids. Next, use an eye liner to draw a line along the upper lash line. Then, apply a coat of mascara to your eyelashes. Finally, apply a small amount of lip gloss to your eyelids.
text.Response B: Eyelids have a natural, glossy shine, and there are a few different methods you can use to create a similar effect on your own eyelids. You could apply a traditional eyeliner, which will create a very defined look. You could also use an eye shadow that contains shimmery pigments, which will give your eyelids a subtle, iridescent shine. Another option is to use a cream-based product, such as an eye shadow primer, to give your eyelids a dewy, shiny appearance.

meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

105.displayed_text:
Prompt

Can you tell me how to create glossy eyelids?

Response A

To create glossy eyelids, you will need the following supplies:

- Eye shadow
- Eye liner
- Mascara
- Lip gloss

To create the glossy eyelids, start by applying a layer of eye shadow to your eyelids. Next, use an eye liner to draw a line along the upper lash line. Then, apply a coat of mascara to your eyelashes. Finally, apply a small amount of lip gloss to your eyelids.

Response B

Eyelids have a natural, glossy shine, and there are a few different methods you can use to create a similar effect on your own eyelids. You could apply a traditional eyeliner, which will create a very defined look. You could also use an eye shadow that contains shimmery pigments, which will give your eyelids a subtle, iridescent shine. Another option is to use a cream-based product, such as an eye shadow primer, to give your eyelids a dewy, shiny appearance.
